title: Threshold Properties of Monomial Ideals
description: Investigated threshold properties of monomial ideals.  Obtained nontrivial bounds for pojective dimension. Used Maculay2 (an algebraic research language) to search for and test conjectures.

title: Linearly Presented Ideals
description: Investigated properties of primary monomial ideals with linear presentation. Extensively used Macaulay2 and Python to visualize and test conjectures. Obtained structural results concerning linearly presented primary monomial ideals and applied such results to hypergraphs and socle degree.
